doc.title: About KiriKiri Z
doc.para: About KiriKiri Z KiriKiri Z is a KiriKiri 2 fork project aimed at VC build support, removal of legacy features, and addition of modern features. For TJS2 syntax, please refer to the TJS2 Help. This documentation focuses on KiriKiri classes.

Author Contact Information, etc. Author : W.Dee <dee@kikyou.info> For KiriKiri Z, contact @jin1016
Download from here KiriKiri Z Download : KiriKiri Z Source Code Download : GitHub Repository
